> [Ganthrax]

> Ganthrax was settling down by a lake, watching the night stars. 
The 
water 
> glimmered from the moonlight.  Ganthrax's dark body could only be 
seen by 
> his glowing red optics.  He walked up to the edge of the lake, and 
looked at 
> his reflection.  He thought to himself, Earth was wonderful.  
Marvelous.  
> Ganthrax went over by some trees, and went to sleep, his red optics 
getting 
> dimmer and dimmer.  So much beauty, so many things to see, so many 
bots to 
> kill.  Yes, Earth was wondeful.
